name: Nedbank Travel Card
shortDescription: The Nedbank Travel Card offers you a safe, convenient and affordable way to access your money when you travel. It allows you to load up to 8 international currencies at locked-in exchange rates.
salesHighlights: Load up to 8 international currencies with locked-in exchange rate.
The card will automatically use the currency of the country where you are using the card.
We will arrange emergency cash for you should you lose both your cards.
No commission charged when you cash out your card on returning from your travels.
Reloadable and has a life span of 3 years.
Accepted globally at more than 34 million ATMs and merchant point-of-sale (POS) locations.
Remotely top-up your funds by emailing retailfx@nedbank.co.za with your request.
View your transactions on the Nedbank Money app

productFeatures.name: CardFee
productFeatures.description: Card fee - R150 once-off for three years (currently free until 31 Dec 2018 if you purchase a card)

productFeatures.name: ReplacementCard
productFeatures.description: Replacement card - R150 once-off for three years
